group.description: Specifies the IAM group to which the policy will be applied. Must be an existing IAM group name.

name.description: Specifies the name of the policy. Must be unique within the group and adhere to AWS naming constraints.

name_prefix.description: Sets a prefix for the policy name, which must be unique within the IAM group and adhere to AWS naming conventions.

policy.description: Specifies the policy document to attach to the IAM group, defining permissions and access control. Must be a valid JSON string.
